Info

Defined class GenReadme with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads a base info, creates an CLI interface and runs operations.

class gen_readme.GenReadme(verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: CfgCLI

Defines class GenReadme with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads a base info, creates an CLI interface and runs operations.

It defines:

attributes:
_GEN_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
_CONFIG - Tool info file path.
_LOG - Tool log file path.
_LOGO - Logo for splash screen.
_OPS - List of tool options.
_logger - Logger object API.
methods:
__init__ - Initials GenReadme constructor.
process - Processes and runs operations.
_CONFIG: str = '/conf/gen_readme.cfg'¶
_GEN_VERBOSE: str = 'GEN_README'¶
_LOG: str = '/log/gen_readme.log'¶
_LOGO: str = '/conf/gen_readme.logo'¶
_OPS: List[str] = ['-g', '--gen', '-t', '--type', '-v', '--verbose', '--version']¶
process(verbose: bool = False) → bool[source]¶

Process and run operation.

Parameters:

verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

True (success operation) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

None
